item.title: Think about these 4 things before vibe-coding your next app
item.description:
I don’t know who needs to hear this, but hold off vibe-coding your next production app…

Vibe coding apps like Lovable & Base44 will make it easy for power users to build custom software without code.

But try going to market with your application.

GTM challenges

What do you do when a customer: 1️⃣ Asks you which TLS cipher suites you support? (Or worse, asks you to stop supporting outdated ones) 2️⃣ Needs their data stored in Australia? 3️⃣ Sees a Lovable URL in the dev tools?
